Subject: RE: Bighard: A new challenger in the game
Paragraphs:
Hey Jane,

Thanks for getting back to me. I completely agree that we need to stay on top of our game if we want to stay ahead of the competition. Let's also think about ways we can differentiate ourselves from Bighard, so we can offer our customers something they can't get anywhere else.

I'll keep you updated on anything I find out about them.

Best,
Adam
